replies.bodyText: all of these start from maxAttempts though, except immediately()... I wonder about that last one tbh, and about whether or not we should encourage infinite attempts at all (even though the specs make it possible via maxAttempts(Long.MAX_VALUE) in effect)
replies.author: simonbasle

replies.bodyText: I see no issue with infinite attempts, given that spec supports cancellation, and there can and most probably will be .timeout downstream
replies.author: bsideup
